headline: Truist announces retirement of Vice Chair and Chief Risk Officer Clarke R. Starnes III and appointment of Brad Bender as successor
summary: Truist Financial Corporation (NYSE: TFC) today announced that Clarke R. Starnes III is retiring as vice chair and chief risk officer, following an outstanding 42-year career at the bank.
